channel.title: Brand Y.Z. | Code & Education
channel.description: Recent content on Brand Y.Z. | Code & Education

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Professional Background / 专业背景 Link to heading

[English] I hold a Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) in Software Engineering. With a solid foundation in computer science and years of professional experience in C++ and Python server-side development, I have developed a keen eye for clean code and efficient system architecture.

[中文] 我拥有软件工程专业工学学士学位（B.E.）。凭借深厚的计算机科学基础以及多年 C++ 和 Python 服务端开发的职业经验，我对编写整洁的代码和构建高效的系统架构有着深刻的理解。

My Mission in Education / 教育使命 Link to heading

[English] Today, I am transitioning into the field of K-12 Programming Education. I specialize in:

item.title: From Backend to Blackboard: My New Journey
item.description:
The New Chapter: My Transition Story Link to heading

[English] After years of deep diving into C++ and Python server-side logic and navigating through personal challenges that tested my resilience, I’ve found a new mission. My journey from a software engineer to a coding educator isn’t just a career change—it’s a commitment to passing on the torch of logic and creativity. I’m here to bridge the gap between rigorous industrial development and the boundless curiosity of young minds.
